climbs.name: Electric Parade
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech, Beca Pexiola

content.description: This climb goes up a south-facing buttress past bolts (fixed pin?) to a 2 bolt anchor. Located on the rock formation across from the Lechlinski Cracks. Look at the South end, up in the talus a bit. Faces South.
content.protection: QDs for fixed pro and bolts, maybe some cams (small to med.)
content.location: South face of Ski Slope Clump, across from the Lechlinski Cracks Area of The Virgin Isles West

climbs.name: Booby Love
climbs.fa: Todd  Gordon,  Tucker Tech, Tim Pinar

content.description: This cool top rope is on a boulder on the south end of the clump of Rocks across from the Lechlinsky Crack off of Geo Tour. The route faces south, and starts off the desert floor, on an obvious large boulder. Bolts on top . The left Arete has been top roped too at 5.10-.
content.protection: Top rope set up (biners , cordellette, etc.)
content.location: South of the Ski Slope Area, and facing south.
